name: @frankkai/u-js
description: Useful javascript library across Browser and Node.js.

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && git push
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && git push
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && git push

author: FrankKai
